text: Little Miss Marker is a 1980 American comedy-drama movie directed by Walter Bernstein and was based on the short story by Damon Runyon. It stars Walter Matthau, Tony Curtis, Julie Andrews, Bob Newhart, Brian Dennehy, Lee Grant and was distributed by Universal Pictures. It is the fourth version of the 1934 movie Little Miss Marker. ==Other websites== * * Category:1980 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American movie remakes Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies about children Category:Movies set in the 1930s
title: Little Miss Marker (1980 movie)
